name: Simple Shooter: Become Shooter In 3D Gun Game
name_original: Simple Shooter: Become Shooter In 3D Gun Game
description:
!!! NO ADS !!! ONLY 0.99$ !!!

This is an amazing 3rd person counter strike like shooter, Fight enemy bots in survival modes.

Use 20 different weapons which unlock as you advance in the game including a rocket launcher, shotgun, and a variety of automatic weapons. View your enemies on the map and take cover when you take too much damage.

The game is suits all iPhone, iPad and works perfectly on iOS 9.2, 9.3. Great controls that give you plenty of maneuvering options, great exciting maps and 40 missions, an enemy radar and plenty of fun!

Features

– 4 different maps

– 40 different missions

– 4 different enemies

– 4 different weapons

– highly polished menus

– Highly polished controls
